hero.subheader1: Complete Islamic Knowledge Taught by Scholars

welcome.para_1: As salamu alaykum, peace be upon you, welcome to the Center for Knowledge & Insight üçÉ
welcome.para_2: The greatest need of all Muslims and people is reliable, authentic, and accessible Islamic knowledge. Moreover, knowledge is the light that is gained by studying under qualified teachers
welcome.para_3: Our mission is to link students to true scholars, who connect them to the Noble Prophet (Ô∑∫).

tajwid-amma.desc: Recitation is a pillar of prayer‚Äîapply the rules of tajwid to these regularly read surah!
